ygData.subject: Re: Specializing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s it, except you should take some care that the skill you think is most important (alteration, no real question) is the one that hits 51 first. This
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 1 Nov 1999 ElaineEC@... wrote:

> I'm L20 now and just got specialize. Can someone the benefits of
> specialize. And is there anything special I need to do? I put a
> practice in each at my guild and they seem to be going up
> automatically. What else do I need to do?

That's it, except you should take some care that the skill you think is
most important (alteration, no real question) is the one that hits 51
first.

This is likely to happen naturally, but pay some attentin to it. It would
suck to have Divination be your main specialty.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
